00012 // Button id, for Mouse internal use only,
00013 // not appeal to mouse driver parameters

00017 // event_type
00018 enum MouseEventType {
00019     LEFT_BUTTON = 0,
00020     RIGHT_BUTTON = LEFT_BUTTON+1,
00021     KEY_PRESS = 2,
00022     LEFT_BUTTON_RELEASE = 4,
00023     RIGHT_BUTTON_RELEASE = LEFT_BUTTON_RELEASE+1,
00024     KEY_RELEASE = 6,
00025 };
00026 
00027 #define LEFT_BUTTON_MASK  1
00028 #define RIGHT_BUTTON_MASK 2
00029 
00030 // bit flag of any skey_state, event_skey_state
00031 #define LEFT_SHIFT_KEY_MASK 0x001
00032 #define RIGHT_SHIFT_KEY_MASK 0x002
00033 #define SHIFT_KEY_MASK 0x003
00034 #define LEFT_CONTROL_KEY_MASK 0x004
00035 #define RIGHT_CONTROL_KEY_MASK 0x008
00036 #define CONTROL_KEY_MASK 0x00c
00037 #define LEFT_ALT_KEY_MASK 0x010
00038 #define RIGHT_ALT_KEY_MASK 0x020
00039 #define ALT_KEY_MASK 0x030
00040 #define NUM_LOCK_STATE_MASK 0x040
00041 #define CAP_LOCK_STATE_MASK 0x080
00042 #define SCROLL_LOCK_STATE_MASK 0x100
00043 #define INSERT_STATE_MASK 0x200
00044 #define GRAPH_KEY_MASK 0x400

00056 //-------- Define struct MouseClick -------//
00057 
00060 struct MouseClick {                               // MultiClick buffer structure
00061     int   x, y;
00062     int release_x, release_y;                       // where mouse is release
00063     int   count;                                    // number of clicks
00064     DWORD time;                                     // time of last click
00065     DWORD release_time;                             // time of last release
00066 };
00067 
00068 //------- Define struct MouseEvent --------//
00069 
00070 /*
00073 struct MouseEvent               // event buffer structure
00074 {
00075   int      state;              // mouse state
00076   int      x, y;               // cursor coordinates
00077   DWORD    time;               // time event occurred
00078   unsigned scan_code;           // if scan_code>0 then it's a key press event
00079   unsigned short skey_state;   // speical key state, such as LEFT_SHIFT_KEY_MASK ...
00080 };
00081 */
00082 
00085 struct MouseEvent {                               // event buffer structure
00086     MouseEventType  event_type;                     // mouse state
00087 
00088     DWORD    time;                                  // time event occurred
00089     unsigned short skey_state;                      // speical key state, such as LEFT_SHIFT_KEY_MASK ...
00090     // int      state;              // state mask of mouse button
00091 
00092     int      x, y;                                  // mousecursor coordinates
00093     unsigned scan_code;                             // if scan_code>0 then it's a key press event
00094 };

00099 class Mouse {
00100 public:

00123     int bound_y2;

00128

00130

00133     MouseEventType mouse_event_type;
00134     MouseClick click_buffer[2];                   // left button & right button only
00135     // use : LEFT_BUTTON=0, RIGHT_BUTTON=1
00136     unsigned scan_code;                           // key pressed, keyboard event
00137     unsigned key_code;                            // converted from scan_code and event_skey_state

00187 
00188     int   click_x(int buttonId=0)     { return click_buffer[buttonId].x; }
00189     int   click_y(int buttonId=0)     { return click_buffer[buttonId].y; }
00190     int   release_x(int buttonId=0)   { return click_buffer[buttonId].release_x; }
00191     int   release_y(int buttonId=0)   { return click_buffer[buttonId].release_y; }
00192     int   click_count(int buttonId=0) { return click_buffer[buttonId].count; }
00193 
00194     int is_mouse_event()            { return has_mouse_event; }
00195     int is_key_event()              { return scan_code; }
00196     int is_any_event()              { return has_mouse_event || scan_code; }
00197     int is_press_button_event()     { return has_mouse_event && (mouse_event_type == LEFT_BUTTON || mouse_event_type == RIGHT_BUTTON); }
00198     int is_release_button_event()   { return has_mouse_event && (mouse_event_type == LEFT_BUTTON_RELEASE || mouse_event_type == RIGHT_BUTTON_RELEASE); }
00199 
00200     void reset_click();
